M

MOVE_BTN - Static variable in interface movelib.library.MoveConstants
 
MoveButton - Class in movelib.library
A MoveButton object is attached to each physical button of each controller.
MoveConstants - Interface in movelib.library
Values shared throughout MoveLib.
MoveController - Class in movelib.library
A MoveController object is attached to each physical controller.
MoveLib - Class in movelib.library
Main interface.
MoveLib(PApplet) - Constructor for class movelib.library.MoveLib
Constructor for the MoveLib object
movelib.library - package movelib.library
 
MoveManager - Class in movelib.library
The MoveManager object is used to interface with the connected controllers.
MoveManager() - Constructor for class movelib.library.MoveManager
The MoveManager constructor calls init() and update() to connect to all active controllers
MoveManager(int) - Constructor for class movelib.library.MoveManager
The MoveManager constructor calls init() and update() to connect to all active controllers This overloaded constructor offers the possiblity to customize the type of messages printed by the library.
MoveTracker - Class in movelib.library
Interface to the camera tracking.
MoveTracker(MoveController) - Constructor for class movelib.library.MoveTracker
